metadata.name: ONYX
metadata.description:
It is believed that the Onyx has the potential to absorb negative energy and protect against evil.
I find it to be an incredibly beautiful Gem in nature and of great semblance to the rich African skin.

In this piece, I sought to portray the onyx in a way that doesn’t berate the essence of the gem but compliment it’s astonishing physical attributes in human form.
